description: Maria Kolesnikova was driven by officials to the border with Ukraine but managed to halt her expulsion.
title: Belarus protests: Opposition leader 'tore up passport' to avoid expulsion
title_page: Belarus protests: Opposition leader 'tore up passport' to avoid expulsion - BBC News
maintext: They accepted an offer to leave Belarus with Ms Kolesnikova but when the car reached the border she refused to cross. The two men told journalists they did not know where she was now.
